Rowdy Wolf:





What came through his comm-link started him. He pinned his ears and stoppped 
in his tracks. He looked around, puzzled where Zyber's voice had come from. 
Then he remembered what Quickstrike had told him about the comm-links that 
every bot had.

He had never used his, since he lived on his own, not even knowing other 
bots existed. He wasn't sure how to respond to it. Quickstrike never told 
him how. He kept his ears pinned, not sure what to do. Sher requested of her 
welcome remain. He'd allow if he knew how to respond to her.
